summary.Title: HydraSpecma A/S is looking for an Engineer/Technical Designer
summary.JobHeadline: HydraSpecma A/S is looking for an Engineer/Technical Designer
summary.Presentation: To our RD Design department in Skjern, we are looking to hire an Engineer/Technical designer for development and documentation of hydraulic systems, hydraulic power packs and hydraulic manifolds.

WorkPlace.Name: HydraSpecma A/S
WorkPlace.Description:
Om HydraSpecma
· Vi har mere end 45 års erfaring inden for hydraulik.
· Vi er en særdeles solid og stærk partner for lokale, globale og internationale virksomheder.
· Vi er repræsenteret i både ind- og udland med hovedkontor i Skjern samt afdelinger i Greve, USA, Kina og Indien.
· I Danmark beskæftiger vi ca. 265 engagerede medarbejdere. 
· I slutningen af 2015 opkøbte Hydra-Grene den svenske hydraulikspecialist – Specma – og pr. 1. januar 2020 er vi samlet under et navn; HydraSpecma.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: HydraSpecma A/S is looking for an Engineer/Technical Designer
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
To our RD Design department in Skjern, we are looking to hire an Engineer/Technical designer for development and documentation of hydraulic systems, hydraulic power packs and hydraulic manifolds.
The position is with prompt start.

In close cooperation with the department’s other employees and different project leaders, you will be responsible for the CAD-work of the development projects, which primarily revolves around hydraulic systems. You will be designing solutions in 3D as well as produce productions and assembly drawings. You will have many talented colleagues to consult with, and you will be a specialist in CAD-construction of hydraulic manifolds to hydraulic systems, including how you gain an optimal design based on different parameters and considerations.

HydraSpecma has its own in-house, highly specialized, and automated CNC machine department, which means you will have the opportunity to follow the creation of your products at close range and get inputs to design improvements regularly. It is important that you can manage yourself in many departments and on all levels and are able to consult with people with different backgrounds to achieve the best designs.

Your qualifications:
You probably have a background as a technical designer, engineer or similar, you master 3D CAD-programs on a high level. HydraSpecma uses Inventor and Vault. Therefore, experience in these programs is important as well as experience with Geometrical Product Specifications ( GPS ) objectives is an advantage. You are efficient in speaking and writing English. You can keep an overview, have a creative mind, and you are solutions and result oriented. You are motivated by technical challenges and can keep your focus in demanding tasks. You take joint responsibility toward the task, and you know that your results are achieved on the basis of team spirit and cooperation. Your positive mind and your personal attributes contribute to keep the good tone and culture in the company.

We offer:
A challenging job in an exciting, solid, and international company with a good working climate and an unformal culture and tone – the keyword is service. You can expect a busy and exciting working day with the opportunity for personal growth.

If you are interested in more information about the position, you are more than welcome to call our head of the department, Christoffer Laursen on +45 4137 1406.

You need to fill in your application and CV through our website www.hydraspecma.com/career.
Applications send to HydraSpecma by other means do not come into consideration. We do not have a deadline for applications. We are waiting for the right candidate, so do not hesitate to send your application as soon as possible.

Applications are processed in confidence and on an ongoing basis.
